message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to start with a price of $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is my best offer, as it's the maximum I can afford.

I understand that $12,000 was a bit steep, but I was hoping you'd be willing to meet me in the middle. Considering your offer of $8,500, I'm willing to compromise at $11,000. This is my best counteroffer so far, and I'm hoping we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit too much for me. I'm happy to meet you halfway between your last offer and my previous offer, and offer $9,750 for the product. I truly believe this is a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, Bob, but I'm still not quite ready to accept $9,750. Considering your offer, I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $10,500. This is my best offer so far, and I'm hoping we can reach a deal.

Alice, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $10,500 is still out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $9,250 for the product. This is a fair compromise, considering how close we are to reaching an agreement. Let's try to make this work.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. Considering your offer of $9,250, I'm willing to meet you at $10,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm hoping we can finally reach an agreement.
